DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate efficacy Levonorgestrel Releasing Intrauterine device ( LNR-IUD ) genitourinary symptom patient abnormal uterine bleeding . The patient ask urogenital distress inventory ( UDI ) ( include ; irritative symptom , stress symptom , obstructive discomfort ) incontinence impact questionnaire ( IIQ ) ( include ; physical activity , travel , social/relationships , emotional health ) questionnaires day application LNR-IUD six month later procedure . Statistical analyse perform evaluate change time period .
DOC.brief_title: Genitourinary Symptoms With Levonorgestrel Releasing Intrauterine Systems
